Description:
Person Specific: Education: Completed full time education to a High school levelMinimum Experience and Knowledge: 3 + years either in a retail environment or VM role Job-Specific Skills:A passion and love of design, colour and style
Visual Merchandising skills gained ideally from a furniture or home furnishings/accessories background (fashion may be considered)
Eye for detail
Strong interest in interior/fashion design and a knowledge of local and international
Market trends
Good communication skills
Able to engage and work well with different cultures and nationalities
Receptive to constructive criticism
Ensure a daily store walk with the Senior Visual Merchandiser is carried out and checklist/action plans are executed correctly and on time. 
Computer literate (Power Point, Excel, Office, any design package Photoshop, Illustrator an advantage) Job Details
